Rules.InvariantScript:
UpdateIf(
    Switch(
        selectedInvDim,
        "colors",
        allColors,
        "sizes",
        allSizes,
        "styles",
        allStyles,
        "configs",
        allConfigs
    ),
    IsChosen = true,
    {IsChosen: false}
);

If(
    IsBlank(
        Concat(
            Filter(
                Switch(
                    selectedInvDim,
                    "colors",
                    allColors,
                    "sizes",
                    allSizes,
                    "styles",
                    allStyles,
                    "configs",
                    allConfigs
                ),
                IsChosen = true
            ),
            Value,
            ", "
        )
    ),
    "None",
    Concat(
        Filter(
            Switch(
                selectedInvDim,
                "colors",
                allColors,
                "sizes",
                allSizes,
                "styles",
                allStyles,
                "configs",
                allConfigs
            ),
            IsChosen = true
        ),
        Value,
        ", "
    )
)

SortByColumns(
    Search(
        Switch(selectedInvDim, "colors", allColors, "sizes", allSizes, "styles", allStyles, "configs", allConfigs),
        TextInput_searchInvDim.Text,
        Value),
    "Value",
SortOrder.Ascending)

If(
    ThisItem.IsChosen,
    UpdateIf(
        Switch(
            selectedInvDim,
            "colors",
            allColors,
            "sizes",
            allSizes,
            "styles",
            allStyles,
            "configs",
            allConfigs
        ),
        Value = ThisItem.Value,
        {IsChosen: false}
    ),
    UpdateIf(
        Switch(
            selectedInvDim,
            "colors",
            allColors,
            "sizes",
            allSizes,
            "styles",
            allStyles,
            "configs",
            allConfigs
        ),
        Value = ThisItem.Value,
        {IsChosen: true}
    )
)
